title: I hate these new runes
body:
They make the game even more snowbally and crazy. There is a lack of choices along with the part where there are clearly better runes than others in your limited pool of selection.

Marksman have huge chunks of damage from their runes and lifesteal to boot
Assassins have an INSANE amount of movement speed boosts with burst
Mages are...throwing comets instead of spamming Aery
Supports don't really know what they are doing because they pretty much only have Aery to choose from
Tanks are dying faster unless they choose to forgo their tankiness and instead become unstoppable movement speed assassin/juggernaut freak shows (I'm looking at you Nasus)

The burst meta is really ticking me off.

I'm not really sure why we had to scrap all the runes and masteries and start everything from scratch after 8 years other than scamming the entire player base by making it nearly impossible to grind for BE to get free champions.
